about_the_game:
Tension Rises...

Tension is rising in Vanaheim following the events of Chapter One..
The Cabal is split, and the inhabitants of Vanaheim are more uneasy than ever.
Tension is in the air any any conversation one must be walking on eggshells to be sure they can remain safe in the new, chaotic environment..

New Content

New Endings, the conclusion to the series
Fully illustrated adult scenes with all of the main characters
Animated Endings
New Sprites, assets
Fifteen Fully Illustrated Cut Scenes
Eight Animated Endings
Custom songs with vocal performances

content_descriptors.notes: Chapter Two features sexual content, in the form of pornographic scenes feature fetish content with all of the main characters - this is completely voluntary in the game, and may be skipped with no penalty as well as not being a focus of the game.

short_description: The conclusion to the Familiar Travels series - Tension is rising in Vanaheim, experience some of the highest highs of the series, and some of the lowest lows. Witness the conclusion of the story with every character with a wealth of new content.
